metadata.title: CVE-2017-13756 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - negligible
metadata.description:
In The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.4.2, opening a crafted disk image triggersinfinite recursion in dos_load_ext_table() in tsk/vs/dos.c in libtskvs.a,as demonstrated by mmls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtsk19 - 4.4.2-3
sleuthkit - 4.4.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-3').
